sentences.english: I just found someone falsely your account.

sentences.english: He says the women have been duped by impostors who have assumed his identity.
sentences.chinese: 他说这些女孩是被冒用了他身份的骗子们欺骗了。

sentences.english: Some have even been arrested and imprisoned for crimes committed by their doppelgangers.
sentences.chinese: 有些人甚至因为冒用者所犯下的罪行而𨱍铛入狱。

sentences.english: Forbidden and inferior sale of box of second fruit person and nonlocal pome infringement.
sentences.chinese: 严禁劣质次果人箱销售和外地梨果冒用商标。

definition: to embezzle/to defraud/to use illegitimately/to misappropriate
to assume sb's name and take his place (idiom); to impersonate/to pose under a false name
to impersonate/to pose as (someone else)/to counterfeit/to palm off (a fake as a genuine)
